pnp:TermGroup.Name: System
pnp:TermGroup.Description: These term sets are used by the system itself.

pnp:TermSet.Name: Hashtags
pnp:TermSet.Description: This term set contains all of the terms that have been used as hashtags.

pnp:TermSet.Name: Keywords
pnp:TermSet.Description: This term set contains all of the terms that have been used as keywords that are not in existing term sets.
